mapper.sql: A.ID, A.NAME, A.STATUS as status, A.creator as creator, A.CREATE_DT as createDt, A.UPDATER as updater, A.UPDATE_DT as updateDt, A.REMARK as remark
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM T_SYS_ROLE A WHERE ID=#{id}
SELECT id, name FROM T_SYS_ROLE WHERE status='ON'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_sys_role WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT menu_id FROM t_sys_role_menu WHERE role_id=#{roleId}
SELECT permission_id FROM t_sys_role_permission WHERE role_id=#{roleId}

SELECT DISTINCT A.ID as "id", A.NAME as "name", A.PARENT_ID as "pid", 'true' as "isParent" FROM T_SYS_MENU A JOIN T_SYS_ROLE_MENU B on(A.ID=B.MENU_ID) JOIN T_SYS_ROLE C ON(C.ID=B.ROLE_ID) UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT A.ID as "id", A.name as "name", A.MENU_ID as "pid",'false' as "isParent" FROM T_SYS_PERMISSION A JOIN T_SYS_ROLE_PERMISSION B on(A.ID=B.PERMISSION_ID) JOIN T_SYS_ROLE C ON(C.ID=B.ROLE_ID)

SELECT ID as "id", NAME as "name", PARENT_ID as "pid", 'true' as "isParent",ORDER_NO FROM T_SYS_MENU WHERE STATUS='ON' UNION ALL SELECT a.ID as "id", a.NAME as "name", a.MENU_ID as "pid",'false' as "isParent",b.ORDER_NO FROM T_SYS_PERMISSION a JOIN (SELECT * FROM T_SYS_MENU WHERE STATUS='ON') b ON(a.MENU_ID=b.ID) ORDER BY ORDER_NO
SELECT count(*) FROM T_SYS_ROLE WHERE STATUS!='DEL' and ID=#{id}
SELECT A.ID,A.NAME, A.REMARK, A.creator, A.CREATE_DT as createDt FROM T_SYS_ROLE A WHERE A.ID=#{id}
SELECT A.ID as "id",A.NAME as "name" FROM T_SYS_ROLE A WHERE A.STATUS='ON'
SELECT count(1) FROM T_SYS_ROLE where NAME=#{name}
